name: Patience & Fury
description:
Patience & Fury is first person dungeon crawler.

You have two statistics, Patience and Fury

Patience makes you take less damage.

Fury makes you do more damage.

When taking damage, your highest stat will go down. When they both go to zero you die and go back to previous checkpoint (yellow torrus) .

Controls: W A S D for movement, Q E for rotating camera.

If you are stuck because of low stats, restart game, be careful next time!

Known bugs with keys.
